title: Test Execution System
description: Implement a test execution system that runs automated test suites to validate application functionality and ensure code quality before deployment.
iWant: a test execution system that runs automated test suites
soThat: I can validate application functionality and ensure code quality standards are met
acceptanceCriteria: System executes unit tests with pass/fail results
Test reports display execution summary with coverage metrics
Failed tests provide detailed error information and stack traces
